intro: Arthrosia gracilis, commonly known as the slender arthrosia, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of South America. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes many species with showy flowers and milky sap. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and somewhat endangered species.
